profileText: a Representative from California; born in Merced, Merced County, Calif., September 23, 1977; graduated from Golden Valley High School, Merced, Calif., 1996; B.A., University of California, Santa Barbara, Calif., 2000; business owner; faculty, University of California, Merced, Calif.; staff, California state assembly, 2000-2006; staff, California state senate, 2007-2011; member of the California state assembly, 2012-2022; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress in 2022; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress (January 3, 2025-present).
